query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'amenities' AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('isActive', 'amenityCategory');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3yaEUUPpH7u5Dce.4e413a58b2a3 --database FCSdcQDHNngsNZkY5BfGCD --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'amenities' AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('isActive', 'amenityCategory');
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	COLUMN_TYPE	DATA_TYPE
amenityCategory	enum('basic','comfort','security','outdoor','entertainment','other')	enum
isActive	tinyint(1)	tinyint
